olb R package 2.0.0

Produce a report of legislative activity in a given period

gera_relatorio.Rd

gera_relatorio() summarizes legislative data and outputs a Rmarkdown report.

gera_relatorio(ini, end, titulo = "Relatorio de Acompanhamento",
  autor = "OLB", tema = "Economia", out_dir = getwd())

Arguments

ini

Starting date in the YYYY-MM-DD format (character).
end

Ending date in the YYYY-MM-DD format (character).
titulo

Title of the report.
autor

Author of the report (defaults to 'OLB').
tema

Theme of the report (defaults to 'Economia').
out_dir

Output directory to store the report.

Value

A report and its corresponding .Rmd file.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
